name: Sketch Fleets: Recolored
description:
The Game

Explore the far reaches of the cosmos inside a sketchbook given life, born out of some kid's boredom in class! Take control of a hand-drawn ship and hop from planet to planet, destroying opponents on the way! Collect pencil shavings and use them to buy items and upgrades!

In the vastness of paper-space, you won't be alone! Steal your enemies' colors and use them to literally draw in your own ships! Each color has a different power, ranging from pyromancy and bounciness to mind control and vampirism.

Once you're done, enjoy the finer things in life, like obsessing over the cards you've collected along the way! Every enemy and item has a chance of dropping a card with poorly written lore or unfunny jokes.

Oh, and get ready for some bullet dodgin'! You'll need it to survive whats coming your way!

The Team

Sketch Fleets: Recolored was built using the eldritch energies that inhabit this world (and Unity, but they're pretty much the same thing).
